runs.comm: gentle length ball from over the stumps, patted away
moves away across the left-hander from a length, worked back to the bowler
a thick edge first ball, Razzaq has his hands on his head, making Warner drive with a pitched up ball that moved away enough to take the edge, race past the lone slip and beat third man's dive
a leg-before appeal now, big one from the bowler, hit right in front of middle stump, on the knee roll, on the hop as he missed the work to leg, but that pitched clearly outside the leg stump
solid start this from Razzaq, not much pace, but he's moved it around, kept it tight, this one is pitched up on the stumps, and is worked to leg
too much leg side and works it in front of square leg
zip and away swing first ball, widish delivery swerving away from a good length, Watson goes after it, cannot connect
this time he has him flailing outside the line, this ball has done the opposite, it has started slightly across outside off, and then nipped in after pitching on a length, beats the inside edge
into the pads now from short of a length, worked behind square
fullish into the pads, and whipped in the air, deep square leg in place few metres in from the rope
goes across, opens up to softly defend a short of a length ball on leg and takes one
Gul working up some pace, fullish into the stumps, Warner leans across to work to mid on, and beats the direct hit to the other end
that kicked a bit from a good length, Warner checks his push from the crease, single is on to extra cover
that looked a very good shout, full and catching him on the pads as Watson missed the flick, pitched around off, hit him in front of leg stump as it nipped in, some doubt with the angle
smack! Watson breaks free in typical fashion, gets forward to a pitched up ball, reaches with the swing and deposits it cleanly straight down the ground
was lining up the swing again, this one held its line from a good length, and he defended solidly to off
tries to smash it down the ground again, wider line this time, mistimed off the inner part of the blade
opens the bat late and runs a length ball down to third man
back of a length, cramping him as it moves in a bit, dropped towards point
Warner gets going now, shortish, he pulls off the front foot, from outside the crease, mows it over wide long on
Gul replies with a skiddy sharp bouncer into Warner, who pulls his head away and hooks it behind square leg
tries the swat down the ground again, thick inside edge behind square leg
pings him on the glove, good delivery, short of a length, getting big on Warner, who tries to weave out of the line, it holds its line and takes glove to roll behind point
Gul coming back superbly after that six, now he hurls in an inswinging yorker to Watson, who barely gets it away behind square leg
some width first ball, cut late past a diving point, and they charge back for two
more width, Watson slaps it to the left of mid off, Razzaq scrambles and manages to put in an awkward dive to take pace off the ball
carted over deep midwicket, used the angle into him on the back of a length ball, fetching it from middle and heaving it into the stands
missed out this time, crashed a full delivery straight to mid on
slower one, down the pads, nudged behind square
pushed in the air, but right in the gap between cover and extra cover, lurches away from them before one of the slides near the rope to haul it back in
straightens off a length outside off, pushed to point
fired into middle and leg from round the stumps, worked in front of square
moves forward to work towards midwicket, the ball pops up to vacant forward short leg
tried to make room and bash him through the off side, cramped for room as it skidded in, forced to covers
backs away and opens the face to run it from middle, against the turn, wide of short third man
Watson shuffling about in the crease looking to pull, the ball spins in and goes between his legs
fired in flat to leg stump from over the wicket, rolls away
angled in full to leg again, flicked behind square leg, the throw is very close to the stumps from Arafat, right into Kamran's gloves, direct hit was needed
quick into the pads again, looked to have brushed the pad as he shouldered arms, they run as it is pulled back inside the fine leg rope, given wides
tries to slog-sweep over midwicket, cannot connect with the full delivery angled in
full, flat and fast down the leg side
some flight, Warner comes down the track, and swings it hard to long on
punched off the front foot to wide long off
slog-swept first ball, tossed up on leg stump from round the wicket, Watson reaches out, and dismisses it high over deep midiwicket
lines up a big swing again, this one arrives quicker and fuller, hit down to long on
that has been steered to short fine leg, Warner moves around in the crease, becomes a right-hander, and runs the offbreak from outside his, now, off stump
swatted, Malik pitches it shortish and flat now, some width too, Watson readies himself and bashes it flat over midwicket
full, swung back to the bowler, Malik threatens to throw it back at Watson
oh dear, just got worse for Malik off the last ball, low full toss on the pads, Watson deposits it over deep midwicket once more, thank you very much
they are coming from the other end now, Warner winds up and bursts into a slog sweep over deep square leg
beaten on the cut with a quick one outside off
worked to square leg
he's created so much momentum with his movement down the track, not to the pitch of the ball, but his swing takes it way behind the boundary at wide long on
faster they come, higher they go, full, Warner reaches out, picks it from way outside off, and launches it in front of square leg
length, worked to midwicket
hello, Warner has switch-slog-swept Ajmal over deep midwicket, incredible, he is ready with the right-hander's stance, and carts it with just too much power
worked in front of square leg

another six, shortish from Ajmal, Watson is not quite in position for the pull even as it skids on, but still manages to pack enough power on the swing to cart it over wide long on, first time a batsman has made 50 this series
tries to repeat the stroke, this one came on even quicker, and he ends up mishitting to off
absolutely crunched, absolutely crunched, down to long on
slower through the air, outside off, turned softly to leg

they are going after everything, flicked over wide long on for six now, walks down the pitch, again creates so much momentum that he does not need more than a flick to the length ball, and away it goes as it it has been clubbed
shortish, swatted in front of square leg
swinging in late, full, driven to extra cover
relief for Pakistan and release for the crowd, Watson surprised as this short ball nipped back at his throat, ended up hooking weakly and short fine leg took the top edge
driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
slow length ball around middle and leg, nudged towards midwicket, bowler cuts off the single
shuffles across and works from middle to midwicket
moves across again quite calmly, and runs it to short third man
comes down the pitch, pushes to midwicket
low loopy full toss, patted back to the bowler
cannot get it away again, moves across and pushes to extra cover
down the track, beaten in the flight, but takes two off a thick outside edge behind point

Hafeez is settling under the steepler and he takes it at point, Warner swinging hard at a length ball going across, thick edge flies high, and even though there is a fielder very close to him, Hafeez takes it safely
wobbly full one, outside off, swings and mistimes it down the pitch
that has been scythed through extra cover, pitched up, width outside off, and he creams it off the front foot
another one, Maxwell continuing the attack, heaves a length ball from off through midwicket
yorker moves in full for the middle stump, jammed away to off, bowler fields
low full toss swung away to deep square leg
quick, worked to vacant midwicket
he's given it everything, he really has, swivelled violently to the full ball and shovelled it high over deep square leg
drills a very full one to long on
worked to midwicket, man from the deep runs in
skips out, fetches it from wide outside off, does not get hold of it, dragged on the bounce to wide long on
straightens as he bowls slow on middle, worked through midwicket, the throw hits direct from the deep at the non-striker's, but Hussey has made it
thumps a reverse-switch hit past short third man now
tries to slog sweep, beaten by the slight turn and bounce outside off
connects with the slog sweep now, but finds deep midwicket who runs in and manages to hold on
quick on the stumps, worked past the bowler to long on
driven to a tumbling Hafeez at extra cover
worked through midwicket, they are kept to one as Gul runs in from the deep
shuffles across and works it through square leg, they take the second this time, throw was wayward
misses the sweep as he is struck on the pad
going across on a length, slapped straight to extra cover
whipped to deep midwicket
misses the slog-sweep, inside edged into pad
bowled 'em, tried the slog sweep, missed, Ajmal found middle with some sharp turn from round the wicket
offbreak hits the pads and rolls square on leg as White misses with the bat

missed stumping surely, beats the batsman with flight and lots of turn, pitched leg stump, puff of dust as it zips across, Kamran cannot collect, have to wait for replays, yes, Hussey's back leg was in the air
cut away to sweeper cover
patted back to the bowler
full ball angled widish across the left-hander, drives hard but not far enough from extra cover
that moved in late and full, and he ended up pushing it straight back to the bowler
Australia losing their way towards the end, White now heaves a pitched up ball straight to long on
full and right on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
slower ball, Hussey latches on, pulls it from outside off stump, off the front foot, flat and over midwicket
low full toss now on leg, worked through midwicket, the throw is at the bowler's end as they go for two, but Gul cannot collect the ball cleanly, would have been really tight otherwise
sliding across wide from round the stumps, could have gone harder at that, guided through point

some effort that from the captain at extra cover, it is a flat hit from Hussey, the ball is dying on Hafeez as he dives forward, he takes it on the bounce, and rips the throw to Kamran, who seems surprised as the ball arrives, and hits him, Hussey scrambles back
no, you can attack Ajmal successfully for only so long, he has the smile on now, cleaning Hussey up with a really quick faster one fired in on a length, Ajmal does a furious jig
cuts from off stump, backward point dives and stops the ball, throws it to the keeper, Wade has to dive back in now
opens the face as he shuffles across and runs it behind point
full one sliced hard over covers for a couple as sweeper gets to it
slices again, off a thick edge down to third man, Wade charges up for the second
low full toss hit down to long on
moving in a bit full, mishit to midwicket, it still fetches them two
slow bouncer, and Gul has one more, Christian had a belated go at it, ended up thick-edging it to the keeper
high full toss shovelled past extra cover for a single
